verse:
वेदान्तविज्ञानसुनिश्चितार्थाः संन्यासयोगाद्‌ यतयः शुद्धसत्त्वाः।
ते ब्रह्मलोकेषु परान्तकाले परामृताः परिमुच्यन्ति सर्वे ॥

terms.वेदान्तविज्ञानसुनिश्चितार्थाः: Those who have realized the ultimate truth through the knowledge of Vedanta,
terms.परान्तकाले: at the time of departure from the mortal body,
terms.परामृताः: having attained the supreme immortal state,

meaning: Meaning: The verse explains that those who have attained the true understanding of Vedanta and have dedicated themselves to the practice of renunciation, become purified in their essence. When the time of their departure from this mortal world comes, they attain the supreme immortal state in the realms of Brahman and attain complete liberation from the cycle of birth and death.
